tennis.title: Professional Tennis
tennis.body: For years, I competed on the professional tennis circuit, learning discipline, resilience, and the art of continuous improvement. Every match taught me the value of strategy, adaptability, and mental fortitudeâ€”skills that would later become invaluable in my tech career.

transition.title: Career Transition
transition.body: The decision to pivot from athletics to technology wasn't easy, but it was driven by a passion for problem-solving and creating impact at scale. I immersed myself in learning to code, discovering that the same dedication that made me a competitive athlete could be channeled into building software.

microsoft.title: Software Engineer at Microsoft
microsoft.body: Today, I build scalable systems that impact millions of users. At Microsoft, I apply the same principles of excellence and continuous improvement that defined my athletic career. Every line of code is an opportunity to make a difference.

mindfulness.title: Mindfulness & Balance
mindfulness.body: Outside of work, I find balance through hiking, meditation, and connecting with nature. The lessons from tennisâ€”presence, focus, and breathing through challengesâ€”continue to guide me in both my professional and personal life.
